name: Coloring Games for Kids - Drawing & Color Book
description: Kidlo Coloring Book for Kids is an interactive coloring book for kids with hundreds of beautiful coloring pages and creativity games to fuel your childs imagination.  Discover over 500 exciting games with a wide selection of themes, such as Magic and Fun, Coloring Pencils, Surprise Coloring, Monster Coloring and more. Kids will have a wonderful time coloring, doodling and playing!  There are decoration games too, that will foster your childs creativity. Celebrate Christmas and Easter with our special coloring pages and games on festivals!  Why will kids love this app? - 500+ games in 14 categories to choose from. - Learn colors and shapes easily with fun games. - Lots of exciting decoration games to develop creativity. - Includes Pencil Coloring, Painting & Magical Doodling. - Save your childs wonderful creations. - Cute and attractive images to keep a child hooked.  Why will parents love this app? - Kids will be engaged for hours coloring and playing creativity games. - They will learn to recognize animals, birds and lots more! - They will develop an interest in drawing and painting at an early age.  14 coloring games for kids are free always. Other coloring games for kids can be purchased by paying a tiny subscription fee.  Download now and begin your childs artistic adventure today!
